bibl.title: Bilingual Graffiti from the Ptolemaic Quarries at Akoris and Zawiyat al-Sultan.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Examples of graffiti. - Graffiti in the 250s and 240s: the upper part of the valley. - Graffiti in the 220s: the bottom of the valley. - A changing epigraphic habit. - Akoris south quarry. - Function of the graffiti. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Suto Yoshiyuki and Ryosuke Takahashi, Bilingual Graffiti from the Ptolemaic Quarries at Akoris and Zawiyat al-Sultan.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 729-738, 10 figg.

Introduction. - Examples of graffiti. - Graffiti in the 250s and 240s: the upper part of the valley. - Graffiti in the 220s: the bottom of the valley. - A changing epigraphic habit. - Akoris south quarry. - Function of the graffiti. - Conclusions.
